name: Polynomial Sandbox
description:
GARRY'S MOD BUT BOOTLEG!

This project is a test-of-might of my skills in modular gameobjects.
In Polynomial Sandbox you can:

  • Place and wire electrical objects!
  • Place and drag props!
  • Watch some TVs, with random content

In Polynomial Sandbox you cannot:

  • Play in multiplayer
  • Add your own mods and content
  • Save game

Please, do enjoy as-is!
